#summary How to compile HeeksCAD on Debian in one easy step

copypasta this into your nearest terminal:
{{{
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install -y subversion libopencascade-dev libwxgtk2.8-dev libgtkglext1-dev                
#press enter
svn checkout http://heekscad.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ heekscad
cd heekscad/src/
RUNINPLACE=yes make
}}}

if you want to use make install, remove 'RUNINPLACE=yes'

take a nap for a few minutes.


to add CAM capability:
{{{
cd ..
svn checkout http://heekscnc.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ HeeksCNC
cd HeeksCNC
mkdir PyCam/trunk
svn co https://pycam.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/pycam/trunk/pycam PyCam/trunk/pycam
cd src
RUNINPLACE=yes make
cd ../../
./HeeksCAD
}}}
now do File->Plugins and click "..." and find libheekscnc.so.0.5.1.*
